ApproxsimClient.map.adapter
Class MapLineAdapter

java.lang.Object
  ApproxsimClient.map.adapter.MapDrawableAdapter
      ApproxsimClient.map.adapter.MapLineAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener, ApproxsimObjectAdapter, ApproxsimEventListener
public class MapLineAdapter
extends MapDrawableAdapter

This adapter adapts Line for use on the map.
